languages.text: "Ваши слова истинны. Преступления, свершенные после вынесения вердикта — повод для новых приговоров, а не..."
"Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"
languages.original_text: "Ваши слова истинны. Преступления, свершенные после вынесения вердикта — повод для новых приговоров, а не..."

traits.locale_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not..."
"Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not..."
"Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not..."
"Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"
"Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

languages.text: "Was Ihr sagt, stimmt. Nach einem Urteil begangene Verbrechen sind der Grund für neuerliche Verurteilungen, nicht ..."
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr sagt, stimmt. Nach einem Urteil begangene Verbrechen sind der Grund für neuerliche Verurteilungen, nicht ..."

languages.text: « Bien parlé. Les crimes commis après un verdict requièrent de nouvelles mises en accusation, pas... »
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: « Bien parlé. Les crimes commis après un verdict requièrent de nouvelles mises en accusation, pas... »

languages.text: “确实如此。判决之后犯下的罪行，应当重新进行定罪，而不是——”
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。判决之后犯下的罪行，应当重新进行定罪，而不是——”

languages.text: «Está en lo cierto. Los delitos cometidos tras un veredicto son causa de nuevas condenas, no...».
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: «Está en lo cierto. Los delitos cometidos tras un veredicto son causa de nuevas condenas, no...».

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉は真実です。判決後に犯された犯罪は、新たな有罪判決の原因となるものであって、決して…」
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉は真実です。判決後に犯された犯罪は、新たな有罪判決の原因となるものであって、決して…」

languages.text: "Söylediğin doğru. Verilmiş hükmün ardından işlenen suçlar, yeni davaları mecburi kılar. Aksi hâlde..."
languages.original_text: "Your words are true. Crimes committed after a verdict are cause for new convictions, not—"

traits.locale_text: "Söylediğin doğru. Verilmiş hükmün ardından işlenen suçlar, yeni davaları mecburi kılar. Aksi hâlde..."
